publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-240.1 Mr Alex Salmond: Scottish Executive's Compact with the Voluntary Sector-As an amendment to motion (S1M-240) in the name of Ms Wendy Alexander, insert at end "and furthermore recognises the need for an independent body to be established with the remit to provide pro-active support for the development and promotion of the entire voluntary sector, and in particular to encourage co-operation between Compact signatories, non Compact signatories and the Scottish Executive." Supported by: Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Linda Fabiani*, Fiona Hyslop*, Alex Neil*
